alert.note: Alert for Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 16 at 3:48AM HST until November 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A building northwest swell (330 degrees) will produce advisory level surf along north and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai Oahu, Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui through this afternoon. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf heights from 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores of Molokai. Surf heights building from 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores of Maui. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala
